kou commented on pull request #9237:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9237#issuecomment-761879851


   We need `libgflags.so` only for `plasma-store-server` command.
   It seems that arrow-cpp includes `plasma-store-server`. So we need `gflags` as a runtime dependency.
